Huion Note X10 Smart Digital Notebook

The Huion Note X10 Smart Digital Notebook is a flexible and creative instrument for digital creation and productivity. Utilizing battery-free EMR pen technology, it gives a fluid sketching and writing experience without the need for charging the pen. The notebook has a large working area of 186.9×140.9mm (7.35×5.5 inches) in PC and Android modes, providing enough room for your tasks. With 8192 pressure levels, a pen resolution of 5080 LPI, and an accuracy of ±0.3mm, it provides accurate and responsive performance. The pen offers a reading height of over 10mm and tilt recognition of ±60°, allowing for natural and diverse input techniques. Delicate A5 Notebook

Huion Note X10 has a tough spunlace leather outer cover and 50 sheets of changeable paper. The 2nd generation Huion Scribo pen now has PenTech 3.0 technology, which improves stroke and curve stability. Furthermore, the pen comes with plastic nibs and regular ballpoint refills for a variety of writing needs.

All-day Lasting and Stable Transmission

Huion Note X10 will automatically link your smartphone when you open the notebook and App, and it will detach when you close the notebook. The Huion Note has an 18-hour battery life, allowing you to work all day. Moreover, it incorporates an indicator to highlight the current battery level. Given the A5 size, it's portable to put Huion Note in your bag. A magnetic pen sleeve that may be connected to the body is meant to prevent loss.
